long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud9's API integration platform provides database driven screen pops. The app integrates with back-office applications using APIs like Salesforce and Zendesk. By leveraging the APIs the C9 extension will search any internal database and present the findings in a new window. The C9 app also recognizes any phone numbers presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
